hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description:
"Hi, I'm Gang. I turn complex problems into simple, scalable code. As a Full Stack Developer, I specialize in modern web technologies (Go, TypeScript, React) and bridge the gap between development and data insights.

I value structured code and high-quality results. My long-term goal is to specialize in System Architecture, designing platforms that balance performance with practical execution."

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: Technologies I work with to build amazing digital experiences

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Showcase of my latest work and creative solutions

oms.title: Order Management System (OMS)
oms.description: A responsive dashboard for managing orders and visualizing real-time data using Chart.js.
features: Built a responsive dashboard integrated with ERP APIs.
Visualized real-time data for better decision making.
Optimized user workflow for order tracking.

pmis.title: Port Management System (PMIS)
pmis.description: A comprehensive ship docking and toll collection system developed for Map Ta Phut Port.
features: Managed complex queries for high-performance reporting.
Handled ship docking schedules and toll fee calculations.
Designed scalable architecture for port operations.

itAsset.title: IT Asset Borrow-Return System
itAsset.description: A full-stack application for tracking company equipment with a borrow-return system.
features: End-to-end management of IT asset inventory.
Automated tracking of borrow and return status.

driverTask.title: Driver Task LINE Mini App
driverTask.description: A mobile-first application designed for driver trip management and task tracking.
features: Designed Mobile-first UI/UX for ease of use on the go.

mula.title: MULA
mula.description: A system for managing course schedules and grades of students
features: Manage course schedules and grades of students
